pda.datas

Class Effect

  • java.lang.Object
    • pda.datas.Effect

  • public class Effect
extends java.lang.Object
    Effect is a class containing all the effect method for Photoboost application
    It also contains the undo/redo feature
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Florent Catiau-Tristant and Mehdi Haddad

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int cpt
      The counter of the list, where the current displayed image is in the list
      (package private) EditCtrl editControl
      Is the control of the interface using effect methods
      (package private) boolean isPrevious
      Is true if an image is not the last modified
      (package private) java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.image.BufferedImage> temp
      Is the list containing all the modified images, before save it, to use the undo/redo feature

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Effect(EditCtrl editC)
      The constructor initialize : The editControl attribute The list of undo/redo, by adding the first and original image

      • rognage

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage rognage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                   int xDebut,
                                   int xFin,
                                   int yDebut,
                                   int yFin)
        Cut an image from the bounds with the given size
        Parameters:
        xDebut - The vertical left index of the new size of the image
        xFin - The vertical right index of the new size of the image
        yDebut - The horizontal top index of the new size of the image
        yFin - The horizontal bottom index of the new size of the image
        img - Is the image which will be modified by the effect

      • resize

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage resize(java.awt.image.BufferedImage imageSource,
                                  int l,
                                  int h)
        Resize a given image by the given dimensions
        Parameters:
        h - Is the heigth of the resized image
        l - Is the width of the resizer image
        imageSource - Is the image which will be modified by the effect

      • ajouter

        public void ajouter(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi)
        Add an image to the list. Only used when an image is modified, but no saved
        Parameters:
        bi - Is the image which will be add the the list
